profile.name: I am Kanchan Sharma
profile.detail: I am a Web Developer located in Hartford, Connecticut. I currently work as a part time Remote Junior Web Developer for Coolor, located in Las Vegas. I am looking to take on more work and to increase my skills as a Web Developer.
